backend/tools/__init__.py.description: Tool Registry public API module created with exports: ToolRegistry, ToolDefinition, ToolResult. Uses dataclass for ToolDefinition and Pydantic BaseModel for ToolResult. Imports require PYTHONPATH=. when running from project root.

backend/tools/base.py.description: ToolResult Pydantic model fully implemented with: success (bool), data (Optional[Any]), error (Optional[str]), duration_ms (Optional[float]) fields. Factory methods: create_success(), create_failure(). Convenience aliases: ok(), fail(). Includes model_config with JSON schema examples.

backend/tools/registry.py.description: ToolRegistry now includes structured logging integration. Uses StructuredLogger from backend/services/logger.py. All tool invocations (both sync and async) are logged with: tool_name, inputs (sanitized), success status, duration_ms. Sensitive keys (api_key, password, token, secret, credentials, auth, etc.) are automatically redacted via sanitize_inputs() function. INFO level for success, ERROR level for failures with exception details.

backend/tools/mcp/base.py.description: MCP wrapper utilities created with create_mcp_tool() factory function. Uses extract_function_metadata() to get function signature info and create_pydantic_model_from_params() to dynamically generate Pydantic input models. Supports async handlers and preserves docstrings as tool descriptions. Can customize tool name/description with optional parameters.

backend/tools/mcp/pubmed.py.description: PubMed MCP wrapper created with PubMedSearchInput Pydantic model (query: str, max_results: int with default=5), pubmed_search_literature ToolDefinition, register_pubmed_tools() function, and PUBMED_TOOLS list. Uses lazy import pattern to defer MCP server import until handler invocation.
